memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< double > &m_spectra, int &bin, int const &threshold, int const &nb_above)
memberdef.name: goingAbove

briefdescription.para: Returns the position where the histogram goes under the threshold.

detaileddescription.para: Must start above threshold. There must be at least nb_below points below the threshold

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< double > &m_spectra, int &bin, int const &threshold, int const &nb_below)
memberdef.name: goingBelow

briefdescription.para: Returns the position where the histogram goes under the threshold.

detaileddescription.para: Must start above threshold. There must be at least nb_below points below the threshold
